meanings.definition: Not receiving financial assistance or support from the government or other sources.
meanings.sent1: The unsubsidized project required no help from the government.
meanings.sent2: She chose the unsubsidized option to fund her business independently.
meanings.sent3: The unsubsidized student proudly paid for college on their own.
meanings.sent4: Her unsubsidized determination led her to achieve success without aid.
meanings.sent5: The unsubsidized company stood strong without external support.

meanings.definition: Not subsidized; not having financial aid or assistance provided.
meanings.sent1: The unsubsidized product had no financial backing.
meanings.sent2: They decided to go with the unsubsidized plan to avoid dependency.
meanings.sent3: The unsubsidized car was like a lone ranger on the road.
meanings.sent4: His unsubsidized efforts in the project were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The unsubsidized business thrived through self-sufficiency.
